data.eml:eml: The Cumacean Dimorphostylis elegans Gamô, 1960 (Crustacea), D. bathyelegans n. sp. and D. brevicarpus n. sp. from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Akiyama, Tadashi (2011): The Cumacean Dimorphostylis elegans Gamô, 1960 (Crustacea), D. bathyelegans n. sp. and D. brevicarpus n. sp. from Japan. Zootaxa 2994: 45-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200637
